body: Taking from #400729. Chisa and Takuma (the black haired pair) are childhood friend and they have sexual relationship. Their friends, Yuki and Sora are also childhood friends (both virgins) and they love Chisa and Takuma. All four are horny. Yuki is masturbation junkie and got caught in troubles before (like when she forgot to bring her handcuff key #402464, left her voice chat on #402465, or got tricked by Chisa who gave supplement drink saying it is aphrodisiac #402478). | This one, Chisa asks Yuki how many time her partner usually cum each time. Yuki said 7-8 times (she's virgin, so she just pull the numbers from thin air). Chisa, won't take losing, made her boy use up the whole pack of condoms the next time they did it. ^^;;
